title: Winners of The Day of Requests
body:
Batman: Arkham City – 1469 votes
Witcher 2: Enhanced Edition – 1277 votes
Batman: Arkham Asylum – 1242 votes
Red Faction: Guerrilla – 1168 votes
Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag – 1101 votes
Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance – 1032 votes
Splinter Cell: Blacklist – 983 votes

These seven games were added into my repacking queue and will be available as soon as I finish them. Remember, that my priority is always on fresh games, so these ones will be made in background mode.
